summary: Spend a year in the life of one of America's most innovative classrooms.
cast: Erick Bowen|Rodecoe Dunlow|Kerron Hayes|Anthony Johnson|Matthew Miller|Stevie Mizelle|Cameron Perry|Emily Pilloton|Cj Robertson|Jamesha Thompson|Eric Wandmacher|Ron Wesson|Colin White|Alexia Williams|Chip Zullinger
title: If You Build It
